parts.title: Reading: Laura’s Daily Routine
parts.text: Hello! My name is Laura. I am 26 years old. I am from Australia, and I live in Sydney. I work as a graphic designer. My daily routine is quite simple. I wake up at 7:00 a.m. and have breakfast. My breakfast is usually toast and coffee. At 8:00 a.m., I go to work. My office is near my home. I work from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. After work, I go to the gym. My workout is important to me. In the evening, I cook dinner and watch TV. I usually go to bed at 10:00 p.m. I have a small family. My father is a teacher, and my mother is a nurse. They are very supportive. I have one younger brother. He is 22 years old and studies engineering at the university. We often have dinner together and enjoy spending time as a family.
